_header: He sty upon the Rood that burst hell close
_description: William Herebert, Christ’s Resurrection — one couplet

BLAdd46919.Transcription: He sthey op on þe rode þat barst helle closYgurd he was wyth strengþe þe þrydde day aros…
BLAdd46919.Attributed Author: Herebert (in right margin, written by original hand, f. 210v)
BLAdd46919.Attributed Title: Crucem sanctam steriit (in left margin written by original hand, f. 210v)
